attributes.action: Pass a law to execute the perpetrators of the financial mess.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see as China does.
Pass a law and execute the architects of the financial fiasco.
The chiefs of the banks.
This would in one fell swoop be a popular public policy that would guarantee labours re-election and make it a cause celebre.
It would also mean there would be no costly legal battle to ensure that tax payers money was not wasted on compenstating these figures for the mess that they got the country into.
Nor would it mean the money would have to be paid out in the first place.
So do as china does, hang them publicly.
We ask the PM to create a law giving authority to do that.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
